attributes.action: Give NHS workers a substantial pay rise
attributes.additional_details: Such action can only be taken at national government level.
attributes.background: The National Health Service is already  underfunded as a result of recent government austerity measures. There is now an acute shortage of trained staff but workloads have increased for those still working in the service. This has led to a widespread stress and demoralisation among staff.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Increase NHS and Social Care staff pay by 25%
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/317721

Pay Covid-19 allowance to NHS doctors and nurses equal to 30% of salary
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552365

Pay extra £2500/mth to NHS staff in Corona Virus wards or with Covid19 patients.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/317532
